Massive glass windows overlook the port outside, as the airships of
the Great Realms move back and forth on the tarmack, doing their daily
jobs.  Port Torregiano is one of the largest airships ports in the
Great Realms, since the Tripower and Torregiano was the home of the
original airships.  Passangers and workers walk up and down this giant
lobby which runs along the outside of the port tarmack.  Signs hang
down from the ceiling pointing out locations.
28166.name: Port Torregiano Lobby [Dock III]

description: The circle turns to the east, and another road begins and travels
southwards from this location.  To the east the circle continues
around the Bar and Grill to the Main Road, which leads to the Main
Hangar and Torregiano.  The road to the south has hangars on either
side, which is the storage area.  To the west is "Hangar 102".  A sign
in the road indicates the LANDING & TAKE OFF ZONE is north.
27073.name: Port Circle

description: Leading away from the Tripower Plaza to the west heading to the
eastern side of the city is Hilp Avenue, known for its bars, pubs, and
other various clubs and activities.  Its also known as the party area
of the city, always filled at night with the younger crowds of people
coming out, to hand in the clubs.  North of the street is the
Torregiano Battle Gardens, home to the battle arenas of the city.  To
the south stands Kalilyn Park, the only major area of nature found
inside the city, besides people's front lawns in the neighborhoods.
To the north is Tony's Pizza Parlor, the only other eatery owned by
the Tony Family, the only other being in the city of Westbridge.  To
the south stands the large Citizen's Center of Torregiano, the place
to go to learn all about the city itself, also a place used to hold
meetings with the city counsel.  Hilp Street runs east and west.
28927.name: {G[{GH{gilp {GA{gvenue{G]{x

description: You stand on a very large tower overlooking the colliseum.  This is the
presidential box.  A large chair and stool stands at the end of the tower,
with a table next to it.  Several guards stand around the sides of the
tower, keeping guard.  Before you is the best seat in the colliseum.  You
can see all of the colliseum seating, and the whole arena.  Below two men
battle with swords, and a lion runs around.
27465.name: The President's Box

description: The road here goes into the woods and towards the Northern Mountains.
The road is made from cobblestone, and looks like it has been walked on for
many years.  Back to the east is Moria.  A sign by the road points to the
west, reading "Torregiano".
27001.name: The Mountain Road

description: The cobble stone of the avenue continues to the east and west.  To
the north a large two story building stands.  The lower floor of the
building is all windows, looking into the training gym.  You see
warriors training on weight machines inside.  The lettering on the
window says "{CNew Thalos Sports Complex{x".  To the south, a medium size
two story building stands.  The front window of that shop is filled
with precious jewels.  The sign on the door reads "{CNew Thalos Ave Gem
Shop{x".  New Thalos Avenue continues west and east.
28935.name: {G[{MN{mew {MT{mhalos {GA{gvenue{G]{x

description: [ Lesson Two: Moving & Teleporting Your Airship Around ]
{x
{x  To move your airship, you type "MOVE (Direction)".  Your
airship will move in that direction, and you will see the
room, like if you where walking.  You must do this for every
movement for the airship.
{x
{x  If your engine has the ability to teleport, you can only
teleport to "Beacons" setup around the realms.  Type BEACON
to see a list of available beacons.  From the helm, type
TELEPORT (Beacon Number) to teleport.  Your airship will
teleport to that room.
{x
Move 1 Room Down For Navigation
28192.name: The Airship Driving School

description: A small indoor hangar stands here, big enough for a couple of
airships to fit in.  A few glowing orbs float above, giving off just
enough light to see around the area.  A small workbench is built into
the wall, with a few tools scattered on it.
28255.name: {CP{crivate {CD{cock {m[{C18{m]{x

description: {x
{&        {R/  \    {&|{x  The grassy fields of the Istar Plains opens up here
{&       {R/ Diner  {&|{xto reveal a small resting area for those who travelled
{&      {R/{&/ {RS {&/ {R\  {&|{xthe roadways.  Northwards is a place known as Charlies
{&      / {RE {&/     {&|{xDiner, where one can stop off and grab a bite to eat,
{&     / {RI {&/      {&|{xtake a nap and have their airship repaired.  Before
{&    / {RL {&/       {&|{xthe city of Torregiano this was a major trade route
{&   / {RR {&/        {&|{xstop, but of course now with the major city only a
{&  / {RA {&/{*- - - - -{&|{xfew miles away it has become more of a stopped off of
{& / {RH {&/  \     / {&|{xOutlaws and Lawless people.
{&+--+      {*o{&-{*o   {&|{x  Several years after Charlies established itself on
{&\ {RC {&\    /   \  {&|{xthe roadway came Chocobo Downs, a chocobo farm and
{& \ {RH {&\  /     \ {&|{xrace track namely due to the popularity of the sport
{&  \ {RO {&\{*- - - - -{&|{xamounst the Tradesmen.  Chocobo Downs became known
{&   \ {RC {&\        {&|{xsince someone could own a chocobo, but not have to
{&    \ {RO {&\       {&|{xactually train and race it, where typically you
{&     \ {RB {&\      {&|{xwould, disallowing free time to travel for business.
{&     {R\{&\ {RO {&\ {R/   {&|{xTradesmen could just own the chocobo, and allow
{&      {R\ Downs   {&|{xsomeone else to train and race it, then collect on
{&       {R\  /     {&|{xwhat rewards it may earn.
28440.name: {BThe {RS{routh {BI{bstar {7R{&o{*adw{&a{7y{x

description: You find a small room with a desk, a dresser with a mirror and a
bed within the room.  A single carpet lies on the floor between all
three peices of furniture.  A closet stands to one side.  To the east
a pair of glass doors leads out onto a small balcony.  The room looks
lived in.  Beer bottles line the dresser and desk, clothing scattered
all about the room.
27740.name: [Jack's Bar] Room 5

description: The dull roar of Main Street echos from the west, but the roar of
the Wall Market is even louder from the east.  You are walking between
the buildings of Main Street Torregiano.  To the west is Main Street,
and to the east is the business place of Torregiano.  You see people
walking to and from the market, with packages and things to sell.
27514.name: {G[ {CW{call {CM{carket {CS{ctreet {G]{x

description: {W*{RSTOP{W*{x A large roadblock barricade is meant to stop people from traveling
any further west along the road.  To the west, past the barricade, part of
the wheat field has been torn down.  The earth there is burned and blasted
apart.  To the east, the dirt road continues through a broad expanse of
golden wheat.
27023.name: {BThe {GE{glven {GV{galley {7R{&o{*adw{&a{7y{x

27766.name: Above Port Torregiano [Tower 9]

description: You are on Level B.  To the east and west is nothing but buildings.
People walk back and forth moving boxes and crates, also tring to pawn
off fish and broken items on people.  The Level goes north, and then
slopes down to Level C.
27274.name: {G[{BS{Ce{Ba {RP{rort {YR{yoad{G]{x

description: {x
{x            The drone of machines running almost drown out the sounds      {*M
{x           of life in this neighborhood, as this area can be known as    {g//{G@{g\\
{x           Zone of Torregiano, factories spewing forth coal dust and     {g<{G@@@{g>
{x           dirt, but luckly the city has created a tunnel underground    {g\\{G@{g//
{x           which pipes all the smoke away from the city, only leaving      {*U
{x           the constant noise of work.  On either side slum homes and      {c|

description: You enter the guild.  Within you find a very large gym, where many
diffrent types of training equipment and practising things stand around the
gym.  The floor is covered in soft mat, which is used for when you train
with your guildmaster.  The master, sits on a stool in the corner, watching
you.  The walls are covered in mirrors, and the ceiling has Makou Gas lights
hanging down from it
27265.name: Vampire's Guild

description: {x                     {cWe've Hope You Enjoyed Your Stay!{x
28221.name: Above Port Torregiano, Tripower

description: Arming Your Airship
{x
All airships in the sky are vulnerable to attack.  You do not
need to purchase weapons, but you will have no defence against
attack.  You will find weapons sold in an airship weapons
construction shop.  Each airship has its own max number of
weapons it can hold.  You do not need to purchase all of the
cannons.
{x
Ammo for the weapons can be found at Ammo Shops, usually located
near a weapon shop.
28209.name: Airship Purchasing School

27774.name: Above Port Torregiano [Tower 3]

description: You have entered one of the coolest Pubs you have ever seen.  There are 2
bartenders here, both of whom look like they can mix a fairly tasty treat.
There are several stools around the edge of the bar, and a few booths around
the sides or the bar.  The only exit that you notice is the one you just
came through to the south.
27205.name: Cloud Strife's Bar and Pub

description: {x
{yV{x    The {CLe{7gi{Bon{Cna{7ir{Be {RH{rarbor {RB{rridge{x is the only connection   {yV

{&|{x  before the {CLe{7gi{Bon{x was disbanned.  It now serves as a     {&|
{&|{x  small village, as part of the city of {RT{rorregiano{x.  The   {&|
{&|{x  bridge, built from massive stone blocks, stretches high  {&|
{*---{x above the harbor and sea port below.                    {*---{x
28563.name: {RT{rhe {CLe{7gi{Bon{Cna{7ir{Be {RH{rarbor {RB{rridge{x

description: You stand on the second floor is this quit little Inn.  To the south you
see a small hallway, with four doors on either side.  The hallway is
decorated with diffrent tables, lamps and paintings.  Looks very warm and
home like.
27244.name: Inn Of The Drow: Second Story

the Great Realms move back and forth on the tarmack, doing their daily
jobs.  Port Torregiano is one of the largest airships ports in the
Great Realms, since the Tripower and Torregiano was the home of the
original airships.  Passangers and workers walk up and down this giant
lobby which runs along the outside of the port tarmack.  Signs hang
down from the ceiling pointing out locations.
28180.name: The Port Torregiano Lobby [East]

27556.name: The Small Barrel of Stalin's Organ

description: You stand in the dressing room.  The wall to the east has a large
table attached to it.  A mirror stands behind the table.  Chairs are
lined up along the table too.  To the north a rack stands with
diffrent armor, suits, and dresses.  The room is also filled with
crates and boxes.  A pair of guards stand to the west, which also is a
double door leading into the main room of the "Station".
27198.name: The Dressing Room

description: A large hangar stands here will all the common and public airships
sitting inside.  Most of them are torn apart and only made up of the
skeletons.  Workers work away on the airship hulls preparing for
another day of testing.
27988.name: Public Hull Development

description: You stand at the base of the mountain.  Above you, a small mountain
stands, and the road goes up it, twisting and turning.  A sign points to the
north reading "Torregiano".  Another sign marks the mountain's name, which
is "Blazier Mountain".
27011.name: The Mountain Road

description: The hallway ends very quickly.  There is alot of crates and boxes
here, and only a single door to the north.  The other part of the
hallway is back west.
27195.name: The Hallway

description: {x
{&||=====||{x   A ladder rises above the Main Pier straight up to the
{&||     ||{x center of the bridge.  The massive iron support tower of
{&||=====||{x of the bridge stands to the east and west, above is the
{&||     ||{x main deck.  Below is the Sea Port of Torregiano.
28614.name: {CLe{7gi{Bon{Cna{7ir{Be {RH{rarbor {RB{rridge {CA{cccess {CL{cadder{x

description: [Lesson Three: The Ping Command]
{x
The ping command is your best friend in battle, and in hunting
down other airships.  You type "PING (Direction)" and it will
tell you any airship or mob in that direction, up to 25 rooms.
It will also tell you how many "clicks" it is from you, which
means room.  If you type "Drive (Direction)" that many clicks,
you will reach its location.
28214.name: The Airship Battle School

description: A fenced in area here houses many airships, parked in a row and
chained to the ground.  Some airships look like they have been here
for many years, a fine layer of dust from the outside collecting on
their hulls.  To the north, you see a turn-style gate leaving the
impound lot to the Port Torregiano Tarmack.  To the west is the
Impound Lot Office.
[ TO LEAVE ] Drive North
--> Do not walk out north, or you will need to buy another token.
27955.name: The {RT{rri{Bp{rower {YA{girship {YA{guthority {RI{rmpound {RL{rot{x

description: You step on the TriPower Issued Legion Destroy, that goes by the
the name of "Goblin Warrior".  The deck of the boat is made from a
hard wood.  The outter body of the boat made from iron.  Large cannons
are mounted on the sides of the boat.  You see the helm, and its large
living area.  The open sea awaits...
27284.name: "Goblin Warrior" Legion Destroyer

description: Welcome to the AIRSHIP BATTLE SCHOOL, which will help you
understand how to fire your weapons, and to hunt other airships.  This
school is part of a series of schools to help you work with your
airship.  The school is setup with rooms explaning information about
the airships, like help files.  After reading each room, go DOWN, to
continue the lesson.  And the end you will return to this room.
28211.name: The Airship Battle School

description: This roadway was originally built the Vectorian Empire as part of
its continential network, in theory a person could walk these roadways
all the way to the Figaro Kingdom on the western coast, untold miles
away.  This road served as the main trade passage between what is
known as the Northern Vectorian Tier and Southern Vectorian Tier,
divided by the Reaper Scythe mountains to the south.  Together this
once made the entire Vectorian Empire until the sucession of the
Tripower Kingdom, which ruled over the entire Southern Tier for a
period of time.  Now they only rule over these grassy plains, while
the rest of the Southern Tier is ruled by the Factions.
27134.name: {BThe {RS{routh {BI{bstar {7R{&o{*adw{&a{7y{x

description: A small dirt road known as NorthWest Access Road runs along here
going east and west.  The road runs along the outter fence of the
complex, for security measures.  These roads are used for the Port
Employees to move about and do their business.  The roads encircle the
entire complex to the Main Building, at the southern ends.  The roads
also connect into the main Airship Area.
27379.name: {RNorth{x-{mWest {CH{cangar {RR{road{x

description: {x
{x    {*M   {x{x{x    Small pieces of trash blow around along this boulevard,
{x  {g//{G@{g\\{x   named after the greatest invention of the city, sadly the
{x  {g<{G@@@{g>{x   name of the street doesn't reflect the greatness.  On either
{x  {g\\{G@{g//{x   side shacks and poor looking homes sit as this is known as
{x    {*U   {x{x{x  the bad neighborhoods of Torregiano, the slums, sitting just
{x    {c|   {x{x{x  west of the Industrial Zones.  The sounds of daily life echo
{x    {c|   {x{x{x  around, but also are droned out by the sounds of machines
{x    {c|   {x{x{x  constantly running from the factories to the east.
{x    {c|{x
{GB{goulevard                                                         {GB{goulevard{x
28261.name: {*[{GM{gakou {GB{goulevard{*]{x

description: The building within you find is a large pool hall.  To the
northeast is the pool hall, five green tables stand in room under a
large lights.  The tables are to the north, and east.  To the east you
see a pair of black doors, leading into the back room.  A sign to the
east also reads Bar.
27513.name: {MB{mackstreet {MB{millards{x

{x
{x  Welcome to the Airship Engine Shop, there are THREE different types
of engines, which two types come in several sizes.  The size of the
engine does count to the speed of your airship, most are unaware of
this but the lesser power engine on the larger ships such as the battle
cruisers will cause them to be slow.  V4 is the smallest engine, with
V10 being the largest available at this shop.  The third engine type
is called the Munchausen Sub-Ether Engine, which in fact is not a real
engine, but a device built of Materia that allows your airship to
teleport short distances, using the BEACON system.  Type LIST to see
a list of engines.  Type BUY (Number Code) to purchase which engine
you want.  An airship only needs one engine to move, but it will be
extremly slow due to its underpowered engine.
27892.name: {CP{cort {RT{rorregiano {YE{yngine {YC{yonstruction {YS{yhop{x

27778.name: Above Port Torregiano

description: {x
[North] Reactor #6 Southern Gate
[West] Reactor #7 Gate
[South] Reactor #8 Northern Gate
27815.name: Under Torregiano: West Corridor

description: A small building stands off the side of Main Street in sub-sectors
1 and 2.  Inside is basically a bar, with many horses sitting to the
far east in stables.  A young man walks around with a broom sweeping
up the hay that has accumulated on the main floor.  A small desk
stands to one side, also covered in hair.  The young man looks up as
you enter his shop.
27966.name: South Main Street Stables

description: The Access Road insects with a few other roads.  To the east is the
Western Access Road Extension, which connects to the Western Airship
Road and the main airship run.  To the north and south is the West
Acess Road.  To the west is the tunnel leading to the West Gate of the
Airship Port.
27386.name: {mWest {CP{cort {RT{rorregiano {CI{cntersection{x

description: A stone staircase leads up a stone spiral tower that overlooks the
southern gates of Torregiano, built in the middle of the Southern
Makou Reactor, built as an expansion project when Torregiano only had
4 Reactors.  The staircase leads up to the top the tower.
28993.name: The Stairs of the Clock Tower

description: Nothing but air.  To the west is the Legionnaire Bridge, below,
The Harbor.
{x
28596.name: {BThe {ME{mast {CS{cide {RH{rarbor {RB{rridge {GJ{gum{Gp{x

27565.name: The Med. Barrel of Stalin's Organ

description: {x
{yII               {x  The street turns sharply here to the north and east,
{yII  {G+---------+  {xindicating the southwest corner of the city.  North running
{yII  {G|  {RNorth  {G|  {xalong the western side of the city is Airship Boulevard and
{yII{&={*<{G+---------+{x  Makou Boulevard, split in the middle by the end of New
{yII  {G| {YA{yirship {G|{x  Thalos Avenue.  The north runs homes along Airship, and the
{yII  {G|{GB{goulevard{G|{x  slums of Torregiano along Makou.  New Thalos Avenue running
{yII  {G+---------+  {xeast and west through the center of the city into downtown
{yII               {xis known for its famous buildings and businesses, such as
{yII  {G+---------{G+{x  the New Thalos Gym, and the Church of Nightmares.  Zozo Ave
{yII  {G|  {MEast   {G|{x  is known for its large middle class homes.  To the south
{yII{&={*<{G+---------+{x  west stands Makou Reactor Number One, the first of eight
{yII  {G| {bZ{ro{bz{ro    {G|{x  Makou Reactors found in the city, better known as the
{yII  {G|  {GA{gvenue {G|{x  Torregiano Eight, providing the city and other cities in
{yII  {G+---------+{x  the region with makou gas.
{yII{x
28104.name: {7I{&ntersection of {G[{YA{yirship{G]{x{& & {G[{bZ{ro{bZ{ro{G]{x

description: A small indoor hangar stands here, big enough for a couple of
airships to fit in.  A few glowing orbs float above, giving off just
enough light to see around the area.  A small workbench is built into
the wall, with a few tools scattered on it.
28239.name: {CP{crivate {CD{cock {m[{C4{m]{x

description: A small opening appears in the side of the tunnel, going into a
small hallway.  In all directions are doors leading to different areas
of the testing facility.  The doors to the east and south are
padlocked.  The door to the north reads "Control Room".
27993.name: Off the ATF Course

27089.name: {CP{cort {RT{rorregiano {CT{carmack{x

description: Before you stands a pair of large, iron and wood gates.  The gates
look big enough to fit a large dragon through it.  The gates stand,
holding the contents of Torregiano within.  Above it stands one of the
many Makou Reactors of the city.  Two guards, dressed in military
uniforms of the Tripower stand on either side of the gate, staring at
the people approaching the gates.  You look at the iron and rock wall
that outstretches to either side of you, curving inwards, giving the
city a circular wall.  You notice right before the gates a large metal
strip that is splitting the ground between the city and the city.  The
strip seems to follow the wall, about a foot outwards all the way to
either side of you.  Behind you is the highway that brought you here,
and the northern plains of the TriPower country.
28101.name: {BThe {&G{*ate{&s {Bof {RT{rorregiano{x

description: The massive port stands before you, the iron fence surrounding it
on two sides, the sea of Istar guarding the other side.  Straight
ahead you see the largest building in the lot, and I mean massive.
Several smaller but still massive buildings stand to the western edge
of the port, and a smaller building in the center.
27045.name: {CBefor{7e The Gat{Bes of {RP{rort {RJ{rudge{x

description: The tunnel continues north and south.  To the south a large iron
gate stands with two guards on the other side.  This leads out to the
To the north the tunnel continues.  At the end you can see the light
of the outside.
27547.name: {&[{RT{r-{BA{b-{RP{&]{B Southern Entrance Tunnel{x

description: A small dirt road known as NorthEast Access Road runs along here
going east and west.  The road runs along the outter fence of the
complex, for security measures.  These roads are used for the Port
Employees to move about and do their business.  The roads encircle the
entire complex to the Main Building, at the southern ends.  The roads
also connect into the main Airship Area.
27373.name: {RNorth{x-{MEast {CH{cangar {RR{road{x

description: This building looks like it used to be an apartment complex, but right
now it's pretty uninhabitable, having been completely gutted by a fire of
some sort.  There doesn't look to be anything of interest here, except
perhaps for a pile of charred rubbish in the middle of the floor.  You could
probably move it, but chances are there isn't anything under it anyway.
27309.name: A Smoking Ruin

description: You are in the Second Floor West Side Stairwell.  The stairs wraps around
a pole going up to the third and last floor of this building.  To the west a
large window overlooks the busy streets of Torregiano.  From here you can
see one of the support towers to the cannon.
27227.name: (Deil Inc) 2st Floor W Stairwell

description: {x
{&||=====||{x   A large ladder stretches up the side of the massive iron
{&||     ||{x tower.  The tower stretches up to the top of the tower, a
{&||=====||{x possible fifteen stories above the bridge.  Far below under
{&||     ||{x the bridge is the Sea Port of Torregiano, and the waters of
{&||=====||{x the Sea of Istar.  Airships and boats dock at the five
{&||     ||{x massive piers in the sea port.  An unsure footing on this
{&||=====||{x ladder might cause a nasty spill.
28571.name: {RH{rarbor {RB{rridge {mW{Mest {CA{cccess {CL{cadder{x

description: Its walls are made out of the
same, black rock the church was.  The ceiling is high, and the rafters
of roof are exposed.  All around you, everything is drapped in
darkness.  The windows glare out the light of the city, through its
black glass.  There is a pew here for praying, facing north, to the
throne infront of the church.
27824.name: Eastern Seating Of The Church

description: The base of a small mountain.  The road here turns into a winding,
twisting road that travels up the mountain.  A sign stands next to the road
reading "Blazier Mountain".
27004.name: The Mountain Road

description: {x
{x    {*M   {x{x{x    The avenue stretches to the east and west, lined with its
{x  {g//{G@{g\\{x   rich cobble stone along Camelot Avenue, named after the city
{x  {g<{G@@@{g>{x   keep northwest of Westbridge.  Along the street are large
{x  {g\\{G@{g//{x   two, three and even four story homes, whose outsides reflect
{x    {*U   {x{x{x  that of their rich owners inside.  Along the north behind
{x    {c|   {x{x{x  the homes is the city park known as Kalilyn Park, a lush
{x    {c|   {x{x{x  haven of wilderness amounst the less natural setting of the
{x    {c|   {x{x{x  city.
{x    {c|{x
{GA{gvenue                                                             {GA{gvenue{x
28202.name: {G[{RCa{Ymel{Rot {GA{gvenue{G]{x

description: Its almost like an endless road, there is very little in the
surrounding area to break it up from looking like the rest of the
road.  The Istar Plains, also sometimes called the Torregiano Plains
is mainly made up of grass fields.  Much of it is left to grow wild,
with an occational farm cutting into the wilderness with well groomed
crop fields.  Southwards the Reaper Scythe Mountains stretch upwards
and block the southern view.  These mountains merge into the 'Central
Bowl' mountains that makes up the center of the Cruoris continent, and
can be seen westwards.  These mountains are much taller than the
Reaper Scythe, many of the peaks stretching far into the atmosphere,
and always snow covered.  The South Istar Roadway continues east
towards Torregiano, or west towards Makou City and the road to Vector.
28434.name: {BThe {RS{routh {BI{bstar {7R{&o{*adw{&a{7y{x

description: The cobble stone of the Avenue continues to the east and west.  A
large three story building stands to the north, the bottom front
windows filled with flowers.  A few tables are setup outside, also
filled to the max with flowers.  The sign on the door reads "{CNew
Thalos Avenue Flowers{x".  To the south an even larger four story
building stands.  A doorway to the south leads into the elevator room.
New Thalos Avenue continues in either direction.
28938.name: {G[{MN{mew {MT{mhalos {GA{gvenue{G]{x

description: You walk down the large corridor lobby of the Citizen's Center.
You see people walking around with there children, watching them point
out diffrent areas of interest.  In the center of the lobby you see a
small scale model of the completed Torregiano, or at least the plans
of the future.  To the north, you see a man dressed in a shopkeepers
outfit, asking people to walk in.  To the north, you see a young
Torregiano Teenager greeting people.  To the south, some scholars go
over ancient text.
27655.name: The Lobby Of The Citizen's Center

description: The street continues north and south in Sector 9.  The High Class
of Torregiano walks by down the street, on their daily routine.
Buildings stand on either side of you, small newly planted trees line
the sidewalk.  To the east the shop windows open up to reveal dummies
of the "Podrikev" race.  New parts hang down and sit on glass
displays.  The fancy sign above the door reads "{CThe Podrikev Armor &
Repair{x".  To the west you see another shop with large windows, filled
with human dummies.  The armor displayed in that shop stands in the
window, fancy and expensive.  The sign above the door reads "{CSector 9
Armor{x".  Main Street continues north and south.
28920.name: {C>{c-{C>{RT{C<{c-{G[ {RM{rain {GS{gtreet {G]{c-{C>{BP{C<{c-{C<{x

description: A cat hisses at you as you walk in the alley.  It is kinda dark here, and
trash cans stand to either side.  You are between two tall buildings, to the
east, Main Street is, to the west, a large tower rises above the buildings,
holding the support track.
27400.name: A Back Alley

description: Welcome to the AIRSHIP PURCHASING SCHOOL, which will help you buy
an airship.  If you do not know what to do, this is the place you are
to be.  This school is part of a series of schools to help you work
with your airship.  The school is setup with rooms explaning
information about the airships, like help files.  After reading each
room, go DOWN, to continue the lesson.  And the end you will return to
this room.
28197.name: Airship Purchasing School

description: You are climbing the tower. The noise of your feet makes the iron clank under you. A large sign that says "CANNON SUPPORT TOWER #54" hangs next to you.
You can either go up or down.
27403.name: Climbing The Support Tower

description: {x
{x  The cobble stone of the avenue stretches to the east and west,           {*M
{x lined with iron makou gas lamps, which at night give off a strange      {g//{G@{g\\
{x green glow, giving the city an odd look during the nighttime.  On       {g<{G@@@{g>
{x either side large two or three story homes stand, prepped and clean     {g\\{G@{g//
{x compared to other neighborhoods in this city, only a piece of trash       {*U
{x floats about in the streets from time to time.  It is somewhat quiet      {c|
{x around here, compared to the dull road of the downtown area, or even      {c|
{x more so the industrial area in the northwest side.  As seen all over      {c|
{x the city, the support structure of the makou cannon stands above.         {c|
28109.name: {G[{bZ{ro{bZ{ro {GA{gvenue{G]{x

description: Nothing but air.  To the north is the Legionnaire Bridge, below,
The Harbor.
{x
28579.name: {BThe {rS{Routh {CS{cide {RH{rarbor {RB{rridge {GJ{gum{Gp{x

description: The cobble stone road leads to the east and ends, giving way to the
eastern parts of the city.  Back west is Hilp Avenue.  Its also known
as the party area of the city, always filled at night with the younger
crowds of people coming out, to hand in the clubs.  North of the
street is the Torregiano Battle Gardens, home to the battle arenas of
the city.  To the south stands Kalilyn Park, the only major area of
nature found inside the city, besides people's front lawns in the
neighborhoods.  To the south a small shop displays models in its
window, competition for the Hobby Shop found on North Main Street.
28933.name: {G[{GH{gilp {GA{gvenue{G]{x

description: Its walls are made out of the same, black rock the church was.  The
ceiling is high, and the rafters of roof are exposed.  All around you,
everything is draped in darkness.  The windows glare out the light of
the city, through its black glass.  There is a pew here for praying,
facing north, to the throne in front of the church.
27829.name: Eastern Seating Of The Church

description: {&[ {CPrivate Hangar Section {&]
{x  {*|   {ME   {*| {&[ {CDirectory {&]{x

28232.name: {CP{crivate {RA{rirship {CD{cocking {CB{cay {r[{R2{r]{x

description: Stoves are burning and people are cooking.  Even though it is a bar
you can also get food here.  A large kitchen stands before you, with
everything running hot.  A few young girls run around helping to cook.
27734.name: The Kitchen

description: You enter the guild.  Within you find a very large gym, where many
diffrent types of training equipment and practising things stand around the
gym.  The floor is covered in soft mat, which is used for when you train
with your guildmaster.  The master, sits on a stool in the corner, watching
you.  The walls are covered in mirrors, and the ceiling has Makou Gas lights
hanging down from it
27448.name: The Warrior's Guild

description: This is Port Management.  The office is very large, serveral desks line
the north and south, creating a path to a large desk, all the way to the
east.  People stand behind each desk, writing and caculating things.  The
walls around here are covered in maps of all diffrent locations of the
world.  A world map stands behind the large desk to the east.
27437.name: Port Management

description: The northwest corner of Port Circle.  The circle turns and goes
south from here, or back east towards the Import / Export area.  To
the west a massive structure stands, the sign at the top reads "Hangar
100".  The circle goes to the south, or east.
27071.name: Port Circle

description: A small diner opens up in this corner of the building.  A large
counter runs along the eastern wall, with a kitchen behind it.  Stools
line the counter for people to eat.  Along the western side are
booths.  A small news stand sits in the back selling newspapers, and
passangers and crew members take a break here.
27154.name: Waiting Cafeteria

description: You stand below a support tower for "Stalin's Organ".  You look up to see
it.  It is made from iron beams, which support the iron grid work that the
cannon rotates on.  The bottom is supported by large blocks of stone,
holding the tower down.  You see a ladder going up.  To the east is the
alley and Main Street.
27402.name: Bottom Of The Cannon Control Tower

description: To the north a shop window gives view to many varieties of shoes,
from the oldest known to the current trend.  To the south to acompany
the shoe shop north of itself, is Mangle's Ware, a shop which sports
to the latest fasions.  Hilp Avenue contines to the east and west.
Its also known as the party area of the city, always filled at night
with the younger crowds of people coming out, to hand in the clubs.
North of the street is the Torregiano Battle Gardens, home to the
battle arenas of the city.  To the south stands Kalilyn Park, the only
major area of nature found inside the city, besides people's front
lawns in the neighborhoods.
28932.name: {G[{GH{gilp {GA{gvenue{G]{x

description: The hustle and bustle of downtown is all around as North Main
Street runs along the center of the city.  To the north the large
Leigionaire Harbor Bridge stands, going over top the Harbor below to
the Islane of Accomaxx, once home to the Legion Base.  To the south in
the center of the city stands the Tripower Complex Tower, home to the
Tripower itself.  To the west stands a small two story building.  The
front window of the shop reads The Hobby Shop, displaying some board
games and a bag of dice.
28264.name: {C>{c-{C>{RT{C<{c-{G[ {RM{rain {GS{gtreet {G]{c-{C>{BP{C<{c-{C<{x

description: The southeast corner of the TriPower Plaza.  To the north a very
large stone building stands, the outter stone a dark gray color.
Large pillars with steps outside lead up to the front doors, which are
massive.  The stone above the pillars reads "{CTorregiano Citizen's
Center{x".  To the south you see another guarded entrance to the "{CFirst
National Bank of Torregiano{x".
28917.name: {&-{*[ {7The {RT{rri{Bp{bower {GP{glaza {m({MSE{m) {*]{&-{x

description: A large shop opens up full of beds and other furniture espically
built for airships.  Couches, chairs, desks, all kinds of furniture
stand out in display around the room.  A few merchants wander around,
talking to customers and other merchants.
28218.name: {CP{cort {RT{rorregiano {CF{curniture {CS{chop{x

description: You walk into a very small building.  The whole building is two rooms,
you have entered the main room.  A large counter stretches acrossed the
west, almost like a bar.  It even has stools infront of it.  A gruff looking
man stands behind the bar.  One of his eyes are covered in a eye patch.  He
looks at you as you walk into the door.  On the wall, pictures of diffrent
people stand, each being held up by a dagger with dry blood on it.
27417.name: Torregiano Bounty Hunters INC

description: This shop is filled with tons and tons of junk.  You see all kinds of
things from the realms.  You see swords, daggers, books, tables, desks,
pens, and other things that you have never seen.  Within all the junk a
small looking man peers at you from a corner, which he is sitting in a
rocking chair.  He sits sipping his tea, some music plays from a devise with
a black disc ontop of it.
27433.name: The Torregiano Pawn Shop

description: Nothing but air.  To the east is the Legionnaire Bridge, below,
The Harbor.
{x
28587.name: {BThe {mW{Mest {CS{cide {RH{rarbor {RB{rridge {GJ{gum{Gp{x

27285.name: The Lobby of the TriPower Tower

{x  {g//{G@{g\\{x   buildings stand, pushed up against each other with only rare
{x  {g<{G@@@{g>{x   alleys leading inbetween them.  The buildings are very clean

description: Suprisingly this store is very clean and very well kept.  Unlike
some other parts of the hangar, it displays different types of cannon
balls and other ammo for airships.  A small guy sits behind a counter
in the center of the room.  Glass cases stand on the outer walls.  A
door to the south leaders into the Engine Parts Shop, and the Airship
Repair Shop is north.
27894.name: Port Torregiano Ammo Shop

27779.name: Above Port Torregiano, Tripower

description: A small indoor hangar stands here, big enough for a couple of
airships to fit in.  A few glowing orbs float above, giving off just
enough light to see around the area.  A small workbench is built into
the wall, with a few tools scattered on it.
28241.name: {CP{crivate {CD{cock {m[{C2{m]{x

description: {x
{x           The smell of salt and fish hangs in the air, mostly coming      {*M
{x         from some dead fish hanging from hooks on the sides of the      {g//{G@{g\\
{x         homes and apartments which line this street.  The avenue is     {g<{G@@@{g>
{x         named after the famous city of Westbridge, and is home to       {g\\{G@{g//
{x         the fishermen of the Istar Sea, and workers of the Sea Port       {*U
{x         of Torrregiano.  To the south behind the homes stands the         {c|
{x         Torregiano Battle Gardens, and to the north and below stands      {c|
{x         the Tripower's Legion Base, home to the kingdom's defense.        {c|
{x                                                                           {c|
{GA{gvenue                                                            {GA{gvenue{x
27965.name: {G[{RW{&estbridge {GA{gvenue{G]{x

description: You are at the top of Blazier Mountain.  You can see the whole Realms Of
Balance around you.  The walls of Westbridge can been seen in the distance,
and the same with New Thalos.  Poking out of woods and clearings you can see
other landmarks, like the Holy Grove, The Dwarven Kingdom, and the two
towers in the western realms.  As the wind blows, a small of death hits your
nose.
27006.name: The Mountain Road

description: Before Buying An Airship...
{x
This is a little warning to anyone who is looking to purchase
an airship.  An airship is like a hobby, it requires that you
be around, and will cost you money.  It is a complicated system
which might take time to fully learn, and something new to muds.
Airships are expensive, and you cannot just buy an airship and
say {C "I don't like these" and make it disappear.  Immortals do
not refund airships.  With this warning, continue the school.
{x
Airship shops are not ran by mobs.  You just type LIST and BUY
to run the shops, within the empty rooms.
28198.name: Airship Purchasing School

description: Before you stands a long hallway going down, doors on each side.  The
hallway is filled with diffrent people, walking in either direction.  People
walk in and out of each door.  The door to the east reads "VAMPIRE'S GUILD"
and the door to the west reads "MAGE'S GUILD".
27463.name: The East Colliseum Wing

description: {x
{x            The rich apartments of Legion Boulevard, named after the       {*M
{x          defense force of the Tripower Kingdom stand smashed up         {g//{G@{g\\
{x          against each other, leaving little to no room inbetween        {g<{G@@@{g>
{x          these two to four story structures.  The buildings are         {g\\{G@{g//
{x          dressed in the best fasion, and reflect those who rent           {*U
{x          within.  Above the cannon support structure stands, casting      {c|
{x          shadows over the city during the day, and giving light from      {c|
{x          large gas lights which hang from the structure itself.           {c|
{x                                                                           {c|
{GB{goulevard                                                          {GB{goulevard{x
28300.name: {G[{CLe{7gi{Bon {GB{goulevard{G]{x

27566.name: The Med. Barrel of Stalin's Organ

description: A massive marble swimming pool stretches out here, steaming hot
from heated water piped in from a source unknown.  The pool stretches
out, slowly deepening towards one end.  The water is a light blue, the
same color as the Sea of Istar.  Around the pool a tiled floor wraps
around, warm to the touch.  A long wooden bench stretches against the
wall, and a diving board hangs overhead.  A massive skylight looks out
into the sky above, and clear fogged bricks look out into the Tripower
Plaza.
28428.name: Swimming Pool

description: You follow a small mountain path, along the ridge of the mountain
and into its depths.  You see other citizens enjoying the walk along
this path, going back and forth in arms.
27652.name: A Small Mountain Pass

description: {x
{x             Sector 9 continues north and south.  To the west another      {*M
{x           three story building stands.  A few fire escapes hang         {g//{G@{g\\
{x           outside the front windows in the upper stories.  The          {g<{G@@@{g>
{x           bottom floor windows reveal boxes of Cigars, and the smell    {g\\{G@{g//
{x           of cigar smoke is heavy.  The sign on the glass reads "The      {*U
{x           Torregiano Cigar Shop".  To the east a small two story          {c|
{x           building stands.  In the window you see a globe of the          {c|
{x           Great Realms.  The sign on the front door reads "The            {c|
{x           Torregiano Map Shop".                                           {c|
{x  {CCigar Shop                                                        {CMap Shop{x

description: This massive hangar has enough room to stuff a small fleet of
airships within.  This is the Tripower Industrial Hangar, personal
hangar of the Tripower Company.  There is nothing too special about
this area though, the floors are made from large stone tiles, the
walls are made from stone blocks.  There are large timber supports
holding up the ceiling.  Makou Lamps hang down by chains to help
illuminate the area.
26551.name: {r={c={C[ {RT{rri{Bp{bower {&Industrial Hangar {C]{c={r={x

description: The middle of the backroom has been built into a sitting area.  A
large woodstove has been placed in the center of the room, the long
chimney pipe stretches to the ceiling and out of the building.
Several couchs have been placed around the stove, and a few chairs.  A
healer sits in one soft chair watching his potion cook on the stove,
giving off its healing powers.
27935.name: {MB{mack{Ms{mtreet {MB{millards {GH{gealing {YA{yrea{x

description: Welcome to the Port Judge Inn, the cheapest and best way to sleep,
without paying the city prices.  The hallway goes to the east, past
several more doors.  To the north you see the number "ONE" on the
door.  To the south you see the number "TWO" on the door.
27101.name: Hallway in the Inn

{R6{&-#-{!A       {!A {*-{7 Port Control

Welcome to Port Torregiano, the leader Airship Port in the Great
Realms.  Before you stands a massive building which looks down into
the actual port area, all shown by large glass windows looking out
over the port.  Several arms stick out from the port building, in
which airships are docked to.  Passangers, Tourist and Trade Workers
march up and down the lobby, doing their daily business.  Small Signs
hang from the ceiling pointing out certain "locations" within the
port.
28167.name: The {CP{cort {RT{rorregiano {CL{cobby {x[{R2{rnd {RFloor{x]

description: To the north a large building stands on a hill.  The Main Road
splits up and circles around this hill and building, which is called
Port Circle.  The building on the top is three stories tall, and a
little run down.  A massive sign on the top of the roof reads "PORT
JUDGE BAR - GRILL - INN".  The circle goes north or south.  A sign in
the road indicates the LANDING & TAKE OFF ZONE is north.
27068.name: Port Circle

description: A large structure reaches out from the port building, and large
rings hang off the metal structure to allow airships to dock here.
These Gate Towers are used for overnight parking.  Airships cannot
remained here park for months on end.  DOWN is the Port Tarmack, and
south is the PORT BUILDING.
28178.name: {CP{cort {RT{rorregiano {GG{gate {RT{rower {x[{BIII{x]

description: The tunnel continues here.  Directly north you can see open air and
sky as the tunnel ends.  A large building also stands directly to the
north, which is the Main Building in the Port.  This tunnel is used
for Public Use, other tunnels have other purposes.  To the south is
the exit to this tunnel.
27145.name: {&[{RT{r-{BA{b-{RP{&]{B South Intersection{x

description: A small bathroom stands here, semi clean.  A toilet and a sink is
all this room contains.  A small barred window looks to the west to
the outter yard.
27733.name: The Bathroom

{x  A small and dirty little train station stands here.  A single
ticket booth sits in the corner of the room, along with a few
newspaper racks and chairs.  A doorway to the south leads to the train
platform below, and to the east leads out to New Thalos Avenue and the
Airship Port of Torregiano.
27943.name: New Thalos Ave Train Station

description: You walk into a small office.  A large bench stands acrossed the western
wall with people behind it.  Along the north, south, and east walls, benches
for sitting line it.  Many people sit on the benches, filling out forms and
getting there working papers.
27492.name: The Torregiano Work Office

description: The northern exit out of the hangar leads to the main area of the
port.  The doors are open and you see a road leading out, and to the
west.  A large hangar stands to the north.  Inside the main hangar you
see a corridor as high as the ceiling stretching to the south.  Two
more corridors open up on either side.
27049.name: Inside the Main Hangar [North]

description: This is the highest place on the mountain of Blaizer.  To the north a
valley appears, and the smell of salt water is in the air.  The sea of Istar
can be seen to the north, leading way from this Realm and going into The
Realms Of Vector, a hundred miles away.  To the northeast you can see the
walls of a very large city.  What seems to be floating above the city is a
large, round, long object.  In the center of a city a tower dwarfs the rest
of the buildings.  To the west, you see some trees, and a clearing.  A rough
sign hangs above the path to this clearing, the letters made from twigs and
branches.  The sign reads "Crucifition Hill".
27008.name: The Mountain Road (Highest Point)

description: The stairs coming from above lower down into a large well lighted
tunnel.  The tunnel runs under the church and the city into the center
of this section of the city.  The tunnel is north, and a large gate
with two guards on duty.  The stairs are behind you leading back up to
New Thalos Ave in Torregiano.  To the west you can see a Train Station
of New Thalos Avenue.
[North] Port Torregiano
[Up] New Thalos Avenue
27549.name: {&[{RT{r-{BA{b-{RP{&]{B South Security Gate{x

description: {x
{x    {*M   {x{x{x    The avenue of cobble stone stretches to the east to the

description: {x
{x    {*M   {x{x{x    The sounds of middle class life echo against the walls of
{x  {g//{G@{g\\{x   the three to five story buildings, which stand together in
{x  {g<{G@@@{g>{x   a row, giving little to no space inbetween.  Children tend
{x  {g\\{G@{g//{x   to play along this Boulevard in the northeast side of the
{x    {*U   {x{x{x  city, away from the downtown area.  Behind to buildings to
{x    {c|   {x{x{x  the west, almost hidden is the Torregiano Battle Gardens,
{x    {c|   {x{x{x  home to the city's battle arena.  Above as everywhere else
{x    {c|   {x{x{x  in the city is the Makou Cannon Support Structure.

description: Welcome to Anarchist Brewers, the best booze makers in the world, and
also creator of new types of Drinks.  You stand in the lobby of there main
facility.  The floors are a nice white tile, the walls a yellowish/brown
color.  A large bench to the east stands, with a secretary behind it.  Here
you can make orders, or even by cases of drinks straight from the place.
Also, around Torregiano you can find stores that sell bottles and kegs.
Behind the secretary is a doorway leading into the factory.
27251.name: Anarchist Brewers Lobby

description: You walk down the large corridor lobby of the Citizen's Center.
You see people walking around with there children, watching them point
out diffrent areas of interest.  In the center of the lobby you see a
small scale model of the completed Torregiano, or at least the plans
of the future.  To the north, you see a man dressed in a shopkeepers
outfit, asking people to walk in.  To the north, you see a man working
on a makou gas light.  To the east, two cannons greet you, that stand
on either side of the doorway.  A door to the south reads "OFFCIALS
ONLY", and looks like nothing.
27661.name: The Lobby Of The Citizen's Center

description: You stand in the challenger's training gym. In this room, all the machines
needed to create a strong warrior stands. Weights and lifting bars. Bench
presses, military press, punching bag, even a practice dummy. A trainer
sits in the corner, who will help anyone going into the arena.
27456.name: Challenger A's Training Gym

office is not really clean, and the building itself is almost a shack.
A few rough old chairs line the walls, and some papers are tacked up.
The door out is to the west, and the door to the impound lot to the
east.
27497.name: The TPAA Impound Lot Office

description: {x
{x    {*M   {x{x{x    The air is heavy with salt coming off the Istar Sea to the
{x  {g//{G@{g\\{x   north, and the Legion Harbor.  The houses and apartments
{x  {g<{G@@@{g>{x   around this neighborhood are poor looking, but not as poor
{x  {g\\{G@{g//{x   as the slums.  The smell of fish also hangs in the air, as
{x    {*U   {x{x{x  most people living here work in the Sea Port and fish the
{x    {c|   {x{x{x  Istar Sea.  To the south behind the homes and buildings
{x    {c|   {x{x{x  stand the Torregiano Battle Gardens, famed battle arena of

{x    {c|{x

description: The southwest corner of the TriPower Plaza.  TriPower plaza
continues to the north and west.  Here you see two buildings, one
which is at least three stories tall, and the other a one story
building.  To the west you see a small cafe, where customers are being
served on the patio eating area.  To the south, the grand old opera
house stands.  TriPower Plaza continues to the north, where you see
another intersection of a street.  You see a few apartment buildings
and a library.
28911.name: {&-{*[ {7The {RT{rri{Bp{bower {GP{glaza {m({MSW{m) {*]{&-{x

description: Many grasshoppers lazily sun themselves on the rutted dirt surface
of the Elven Valley Roadway, jumping out of the way only at the last
minute to avoid being crushed.  The tall wheat of the Istar plains
grows all around, whispering quietly in the breeze.
28096.name: {BThe {GE{glven {GV{galley {7R{&o{*adw{&a{7y{x

description: As you walk up and down the hills, the forest behind you disappears
behind some hills.  To road again turns to the west, getting closer to a
small mountian.
27003.name: The Mountain Road

description: Nothing but air.  To the west is the Legionnaire Bridge, below,
The Harbor.
{x
28594.name: {BThe {ME{mast {CS{cide {RH{rarbor {RB{rridge {GJ{gum{Gp{x

description: A small dirt road known as East Access Road runs along here
going north and south.  The road runs along the outter fence of the
complex, for security measures.  These roads are used for the Port
Employees to move about and do their business.  The roads encircle the
entire complex to the Main Building, at the southern ends.  The roads
also connect into the main Airship Area.
27368.name: {&[{RT{r-{BA{b-{RP{&]{B East Access Road{x

description: You stand in the main office of the World Battling Arena.  Inside you see
many desks sitting, with people working there butts off.  Many papers and
other things seem to be changing hands and going around the room.  On the
north wall in big letters is that famous WBA logo.
27234.name: (Deil Inc) World Battling Arena

{x  A large sign greets you, Welcome to Port Torregiano, Home of the
Tripower and Heart of the Airship Society.  From the large windows
to the north overlooking the Airship Field, the marble floors stretch
south, leading to a staircase upwards to the second floor of the Port
Building.  Two sets of double doors are on either side of the lobby
leading out east and west.  From the outside you'd be aware of the
giant doors leading into the building, which stretches like an L
around the Airship Field.
27146.name: {&[{RT{r-{BA{b-{RP{&]{B Outside The Building{x

description: You stand inside the SunFlower Cafe.  People stand around, or sit around
talking about Daily Life in Torregiano.  You see couples talking, and single
men sitting at tables, enjoying there food, or drink.  The walls of the cafe
are covered in nice, scenery pictures.  The flowers on the walls surround
you, like water..  Stupid Wallpaper.  To the west, a large Bar sits with a
few men, and even a woman sitting at it, drinking cold hard drinks.
27190.name: The SunFlower Cafe

description: Main Street stops at this location and branchs out in two
directions, to the east and west of you.  You stand in a great square,
known as TriPower Plaza.  Before you to the north stands the great
tower, headquarters of the TriPower Company.  A large statue of
Nisstyre peers down at you.  The Tower itself stands twenty stories
tall, taller than any structure in the city.  On the front of the
building stands the famous four bars of the TriPower.  Surrounding the
fifteenth floor of the building is the cannon support track.  TriPower
Plaza continues to the east and west.  To the west, you see an opera
house and a small quiet cafe.  To the east you see the bank and
citizen's center.  North is the lobby of the Tripower Tower Complex.
28910.name: {&-{*[ {7The {RT{rri{Bp{bower {GP{glaza {m({MS{m) {*]{&-{x

description: Nothing but air.  To the west is the Legionnaire Bridge, below,
The Harbor.
{x

description: {x
{x    {*M   {x{x{x    Small pieces of trash blow around along this boulevard,
{x  {g//{G@{g\\{x   named after the greatest invention of the city, sadly the
{x  {g<{G@@@{g>{x   name of the street doesn't reflect the greatness.  On either
{x  {g\\{G@{g//{x   side shacks and poor looking homes sit as this is known as
{x    {*U   {x{x{x  the bad neighborhoods of Torregiano, the slums, sitting just
{x    {c|   {x{x{x  west of the Industrial Zones.  The sounds of daily life echo
{x    {c|   {x{x{x  around, but also are droned out by the sounds of machines
{x    {c|   {x{x{x  constantly running from the factories to the east.
{x    {c|{x
{GB{goulevard                                                         {GB{goulevard{x
28703.name: {*[{GM{gakou {GB{goulevard{*]{x

description: A sudden change in the temperature and atmosphere is in the air.
Large amounts of steam slowly pour out from pipes within the walls,
and the room is filled with a large levelled wooden bench all around.
A few people sit in this room, slowly relaxing to the feel of the
steam.  They all only wear a towel.  A door to the south leads to the
{BThe Pool{x.
27043.name: {&[{7-{&><{7[{&T{7he {&S{7pa{7]{&><{7-{&]{x

description: A small dirt road known as SouthWest Access Road runs along here
going east and west.  The road runs along the outter fence of the
complex, for security measures.  These roads are used for the Port
Employees to move about and do their business.  The roads encircle the
entire complex to the Main Building, at the southern ends.  The roads
also connect into the main Airship Area.  The Main Building is
Directly to the west.  A staircase leads to the second floors of the
Main Port Building.
[East] TPAA Airship Impound Lot
27498.name: East Port Building Exit

description: A true chef's dream.  This kitchen is able to hold vast amounts of
cooking tools and wonderous spices for making many delicious recipes.
27802.name: Roomy Kitchen

description: To the north stands Khellis's Gift Shop, popular for its various
gifts come certain holidays or just special occations.  To the south
stands Jortanga's Assorted Armor, one of the finer armor shops in the
city.  Leading away from the Tripower Plaza to the west heading to the
eastern side of the city is Hilp Avenue, known for its bars, pubs, and
other various clubs and activities.  Its also known as the party area
of the city, always filled at night with the younger crowds of people
coming out, to hand in the clubs.  North of the street is the
Torregiano Battle Gardens, home to the battle arenas of the city.  To
the south stands Kalilyn Park, the only major area of nature found
inside the city, besides people's front lawns in the neighborhoods.
28928.name: {G[{GH{gilp {GA{gvenue{G]{x

description: You stand in the waiting area of the Torregiano Station.  Here you see
row after row of seats, allowing people to sit and wait for the train to
arrive.  The room is made from a black marble, windows overlook to the west,
the Train yard.  On the walls, pictures of diffrent places hang, showing
diffrent places of interest.
27649.name: The Waiting Area

description: You stand in a small room.  All four walls are covered in metal, and
there are small drawers, with key holes in the walls.  Each drawer has a
small number on it.  The ceiling is white, with a fan in the middle.  The
floor is made from black and white checkered floor tiles.  A table stands in
the middle of the room.
27411.name: The Safe Deposit Box Area

displayed in neat rows and columns, strategically placed to force
customers to walk by every item in the department.  You can exit via
the spiral staircase down or the closed door to the west.
27811.name: {CMen's Department{x

Massive glass windows overlook the port outside, as the airships of
the Great Realms move back and forth on the tarmack, doing their daily
jobs.  Port Torregiano is one of the largest airships ports in the
Great Realms, since the Tripower and Torregiano was the home of the
original airships.  Passangers and workers walk up and down this giant
lobby which runs along the outside of the port tarmack.  Signs hang
down from the ceiling pointing out locations.
28170.name: Port Torregiano Lobby [Dock I]

description: Nothing but air.  To the east is the Legionnaire Bridge, below,
The Harbor.
{x

description: {x
ATTENTION:  Port Torregiano Offers All Airship Services, and all
parking.  If you are only parking for the day, please use the
temporary parking spaces.  For long term stops please store your
airship at an Airship Docking Tower on the Airship Tarmack.  Our
port offers a Mini-Map to show your location inside the port, please
drive safely!!  (The Tripower Airship Authority [TPAA])
\ DOWN /
\ To /
The Port
27780.name: Above Port Torregiano, Tripower

description: You walk into a crowded book store.  Many hundreds of books line shelf
after shelf in the large expanse of the store.  Among these shelves you will
find book after book of stories of the greatest Heroes and the Undying
Legends of the realms.
27712.name: Heroes and Legends

description: The sounds of Wall Market gets louder.  To the east is the market
itself, packed full of people, to the far west is Main Street.
27516.name: {G[ {CW{call {CM{carket {CS{ctreet {G]{x

description: A large store opens up before you, filled with all kinds of weird
and strange items.  Shelves along the walls are filled with boxed
games, other shelves hold mass amount of books and other binders.
Toys, figures, and almost anything worthless lies about the store.  A
large man sits behind a glass-top counter, which contains paper books
showing cartoons and comics.
28429.name: {RT{rhe {RH{robby {RS{rhop{x

description: The front windows of the northern, three story building reveals
painful weapons.  Large maces with razor sharp spikes dangle from
chains in the story window.  The writing on the window reads "{CElran's
Instruments of Death{x".  To the south you see the three story building,
the front windows hold statues of "{CHeros and Legends{x".  New Thalos
Avenue continues to the east and west.  Sector Nine continues in both
directions.
28936.name: {G[{MN{mew {MT{mhalos {GA{gvenue{G]{x

description: The NorthEast Access Road ends in this corner.  To the south is
East Access Road, which leads to the Eastern Gate.  To the West is
NorthEast Access Road, which leads to the Northern Gate.
27370.name: {RNorth{x-{MEast {CH{cangar {RR{road{x

{7I {*- {7Impound Lot{x
27059.name: {CP{cort {RT{rorregiano {CT{carmack{x

description: Rows of souvenir shot glasses line the walls inside locked cases.
Avoided by the locals, this shop caters mostly to tourists and
travellers that wander in off Torregiano's Main Street.  Despite the
somewhat limited selection, business is brisk and the alcohol flows
freely.
27917.name: {!Tor{&re{!giano{& Sh{!ot{&s{X

description: The salt air is strong here.  You are getting closer to the Istar Sea.
The grass around here is only chest high, and gives you a major view of the
lands around you.  To the south the Northern Mountain range jolts up from
the grass, reaching for the clouds.
27014.name: {BThe {RS{routh {BI{bstar {7R{&o{*adw{&a{7y{x

description: Before you stands a long hallway going down, doors on each side.  The
hallway is filled with diffrent people, walking in either direction.  People
walk in and out of each door.  The door to the east reads "BETTING ROOM".
The Door to the west reads "CLERIC'S GUILD".
27449.name: The West Colliseum Wing

description: This Elven Valley Roadway is nothing more than a rutted, barely
used road leading from Torregiano, to the east, to the Valley
of the Elves, to the west.  All along the road, tall sheafs of
wheat grow wild and untended.
28097.name: {BThe {GE{glven {GV{galley {7R{&o{*adw{&a{7y{x

description: This is the main hangar of Port Judge, in Torregiano.  The hangar
is made from brick, and stands very tall above you.  To either side
huge wooden doors lock away airships in special storage areas.
Bay 3 is north.  Bay 4 is south.
27054.name: Western Main Hangar

description: The Lobby of the Colliseum.  People walk around, talk, smoke and drink.
On the walls diffrent types of items hangs, paintings, weapons, armor ect.
To the north you see a double door with a sign above it "COLLISEUM SEATING".
There is a hallway to either side of you, leading into the inner part of the
colliseum.
27442.name: The Lobby Of The Colliseum

description: A small dirt road known as NorthEast Access Road runs along here
going east and west.  The road runs along the outter fence of the
complex, for security measures.  These roads are used for the Port
Employees to move about and do their business.  The roads encircle the
entire complex to the Main Building, at the southern ends.  The roads
also connect into the main Airship Area.
27372.name: {RNorth{x-{MEast {CH{cangar {RR{road{x

description: You are on Harbor Docks A, which is for merchant ships to docks.
To either side of you is a smaller finger sticking out in the water,
and a ship is docked next to it.  You see all kinds of diffrent people
walking around, moving crates, importing, exporting, and tring to sell
stuff.  You also see some creepy looking guys...  Maybe criminals.
You see steps leading down into the Istar Sea north of here.
27279.name: {BS{Ce{Ba{&-{RP{rort {RT{rorregiano {GP{gier{x {R[{&-{R>{MMAIN{R<{&-{G]{x

description: A large hangar stands here will all the common and public airships
sitting inside.  Most of them are torn apart and only made up of the
skeletons.  Workers work away on the airship hulls preparing for
another day of testing.
27992.name: Non-Public Hull Development

description: The backroom of the billards is used for parties and concerts.  You
walk into the room, which is made of black cinder blocks.  The lights
above are dim, and only give enough light to navigate through the
room.  To the north a stage stands, cheaply made but usful.  A door
stands to the east of the stage.  The backroom continues south into a
group of couches and chairs, and then to the other side of the room.
27934.name: Near the Stage in Backstreets

description: {x
{x    {*M   {x{x{x    The sounds of middle class life echo against the walls of
{x  {g//{G@{g\\{x   the three to five story buildings, which stand together in
{x  {g<{G@@@{g>{x   a row, giving little to no space inbetween.  Children tend
{x  {g\\{G@{g//{x   to play along this Boulevard in the northeast side of the
{x    {*U   {x{x{x  city, away from the downtown area.  Behind to buildings to
{x    {c|   {x{x{x  the west, almost hidden is the Torregiano Battle Gardens,
{x    {c|   {x{x{x  home to the city's battle arena.  Above as everywhere else
{x    {c|   {x{x{x  in the city is the Makou Cannon Support Structure.
{x    {c|{x
{GB{goulevard                                                          {GB{goulevard{x
28400.name: {G[{bC{*annon {GB{goulevard{G]{x

description: A large structure reaches out from the port building, and large
rings hang off the metal structure to allow airships to dock here.
These Gate Towers are used for overnight parking.  Airships cannot
remained here park for months on end.  DOWN is the Port Tarmack, and
south is the PORT BUILDING.
28177.name: {CP{cort {RT{rorregiano {GG{gate {RT{rower {x[{BII{x]

description: You stand inside the dark church.  Its walls are made out of the
same, black rock the church was.  The ceiling is high, and the rafters
of roof are exposed.  All around you, everything is draped in
darkness.  The windows glare out the light of the city, through its
black glass.  There is a pew here for praying, facing north, to the
throne in front of the church.
27281.name: Inside The Church Of Nightmares

description: The room is somewhat cozy in that home feeling.  A single bed sits
in the corner, an old beat up nightstand next to it.  A dresser and a
mirror in the room, a desk and chair.  There are windows looking out
over the port, with light, white curtians on them.
27104.name: Port Judge Inn - Room 3

description: You stand in the SouthEast part of Wall Market.  To the east you
see a large inn, allowing travelers to settle down in this bustling
area of Torregiano.  To the south you see a Pawn Shop, its windows
filled with all types of objects.  Some merchants here try to get you
to buy some fine wines...
27522.name: {&[{rS{ME{&] {CT{che {CW{call {CM{carket {CS{cquare{x

description: Large massive engines stand in the middle of the room, workers
slowly peicing together the parts of the engine themselves.  All the
common and public engines and parts are spread out through this hangar
workshop.  To the east is the public hull shop, and to the north is
the non public engine shop.
28116.name: Non-Public Engine Development

description: The top of the stairs.  All around you are closed doors.  The top
floor of the bar is rented by people to live in.  To the north a door
reads "Room 1".  To the west the door reads "Room 2".  To the east is
"Room 3".  A small hallway goes south to another group of doors.
27736.name: Upstairs

description: You stand in the working area of the Brewery.  All around you men walk,
with sacks and crates of ingredients.  To either side of you, very large
towers of booze stand, you see some of the men climbing up the stairs to it,
and dropping in the contents of the sacks.  The smell of oaks and barly is
very strong around here.  The Brewer Continues eastwards.
27253.name: The Brewery Area (A)

description: You walk into a small cafe.  It is not all that fancy, but it is neat and
there are several customers.  There are only about 6 tables and they all
have a red checkerboard pattern tablecloth.  The smell of good ole home
cookin' hits your nose and your mouth starts to run.  Have a seat and order
somthin', will ya?
27706.name: Rose Betty's Cafe

description: You enter the guild.  Within you find a very large gym, where many
diffrent types of training equipment and practising things stand around the
gym.  The floor is covered in soft mat, which is used for when you train
with your guildmaster.  The master, sits on a stool in the corner, watching
you.  The walls are covered in mirrors, and the ceiling has Makou Gas lights
hanging down from it
27450.name: The Cleric's Guild

description: A large iron gate greets you as you walk in.  The gate is locked
shut, and two guards stand in front of it.  Behind the gate a small
tunnel leads into the Airship Port directly east.  A sign next to the
gate reads AUTHORIZED PERSONELL ONLY!
27543.name: West Security Gate

27341.name: {CP{cort {RT{rorregiano {CT{carmack{x

description: You step into the small night club and the sounds of music and
smell of smoke are rampant in the air.  All around you there are
people dancing, drinking and smoking.  In the corner a few patron
guests are with some fine women.  At the bar you can see Jeff
preparing drinks for people.
27914.name: Studio 420

description: The lobby around this area is somewhat empty.  A few red chairs and
plants sit, some tables with magazines.  The smell of food comes from
the south, in which the Cafeteria stands.  A door to the east reads
"Employee's Only".  To the west is the rest of the lobby.
[South] Port Caferteria
[East] TPAA Airship Impound Lot
27153.name: Port Lobby East

description: {x
{x    {*M   {x{x{x     A small alley stands to the east leading into the back
{x  {g//{G@{g\\{x    of East Main Street, in Sector Two.  To the west, you see
{x  {g<{G@@@{g>{x    a small two story building, with a few cloaked figures.
{x  {g\\{G@{g//{x    The sign above the building reads "Torregiano Bounty Hunters
{x    {*U   {x{x{x   Inc.  ".  To the north the cobble stones of Main Street get
{x    {c|   {x{x{x   brighter and cleaner.  A sign hanging over the street reads
{x    {c|   {x{x{x   [Sector 9], which is known for its high class, rich
{x    {c|   {x{x{x   atmosphere.
{x    {c|{x
{x{CBounty Hunters                                                      {C City Park{x
28905.name: {C>{c-{C>{RT{C<{c--{G[ {RM{rain {GS{gtreet {G]{c--{C>{BP{C<{c-{C<{x

description: You stand at the rear of the church.  To the north, a large
courtyard, and a second building stands before you.  Back south is the
door leading into the Church Of Nightmares, allowing people to walk
in.
27831.name: Outside The Rear Of The Church

{rP P P P

27356.name: {CP{cort {RT{rorregiano {CT{carmack{x

description: Compared with the rest of this hotel, this room is positively luxurious.
Which is to say that in the middle class district of this city it would be
thought of as a normal room.  The windows are clean and let in fresh light
and air while the view overlooking the harbor is, if not breathtaking, at
least pretty.  The bed looks very comfortable, and this room boasts an
honest-to-goodness bed stand and even a chair.  All in all, a room well worth
the extra cost paid at the front desk.
27305.name: room {*four{0

{7I {*- {7Impound Lot{x
27158.name: {CP{cort {RT{rorregiano {YF{yueling {GS{gtation{x

27558.name: The Small Barrel of Stalin's Organ

description: You stand in the Southeast Corner of Wall Market.  To the west, a
large, clean local bar stands, with people walking in and out of it.
The sound of singing echos from within, and a very happy sound.  To
the south, a very small building stands, its windows are filled with
books.  The sign outside reads "The Torregiano Book Store".
27532.name: {&[{rS{mW{&] {CT{che {CW{call {CM{carket {CS{cquare{x

description: {x
{x    {*M   {x{x{x
{x  {g//{G@{g\\{x     The cobble stones of Main Street stretch by the city's
{x  {g<{G@@@{g>{x    Work Office. Souls looking for a quick buck line up outside
{x  {g\\{G@{g//{x    its doors during the day.  To the east a blank lot stands,
{x    {*U   {x{x{x   and the great Torregiano Park can been seen, the lush green
{x    {c|   {x{x{x   trees.  Main Street continues north into the more high class
{x    {c|   {x{x{x   area of Torregiano, known as Sector 9.  To the west is the
{x    {c|   {x{x{x   "Torregiano Work Office".
{x    {c|{x
{x  {CWork Office{x
28903.name: {C>{c-{C>{RT{C<{c--{G[ {RM{rain {GS{gtreet {G]{c--{C>{BP{C<{c-{C<{x

description: The sounds of merchants and business echos from booth sides of you.
The Wall Market is to the east, the center point of trade here.  To
the west is Main Street.
27515.name: {G[ {CW{call {CM{carket {CS{ctreet {G]{x

description: This is the main hangar of Port Judge, in Torregiano.  The hangar
is made from brick, and stands very tall above you.  To either side
huge wooden doors lock away airships in special storage areas.
Bay 7 is north.  Bay 8 is south.
27050.name: Eastern Main Hangar

description: You stand in a dark basement.  Crates of booze and rat droppings
are all over here.  There is really nothing more in here except crates
and boxes and the rats.
27263.name: {GT{ghe {GB{gasement of "{YT{yhe {YG{yolden {YK{yeg{g"{x

description: You follow a small mountain path, along the ridge of the mountain
and into its depths.  You see other citizens enjoying the walk along
this path, going back and forth in arms.
27489.name: A Small Mountain Path

description: Before you stands a long hallway going down, doors on each side.  The
hallway is filled with diffrent people, walking in either direction.  People
walk in and out of each door.  The door to the east reads "THIEVE"S GUILD".
The door to the west reads "SOVENIR SHOP".
27460.name: The East Colliseum Wing

description: A lonely dirt road travels through the open expanse of the Istar
plains.  The surrounding countryside is quite flat and covered in
tall golden wild wheat.  When the wind blows, the plains ripple as
is they were liquid.  The road continues west and east.
28100.name: {BThe {GE{glven {GV{galley {7R{&o{*adw{&a{7y{x

description: You find yourself standing in a small pet shop.  Cages line the walls on
both sides of you filled wioth various animals and other cute thing that
could be your pet.  A large door in the back of the room Reads: DO NOT ENTER
DANGER.  You only can wonder what be back there.  Also towards the back of
the room there are larger cages for the pet owner of the bigger kind, which
kind of pet person are you?
27509.name: A Pet shop

description: You stand before a sunked stairway leading down to a set of wide
double doors.  The familiar sounds of laughter, pool, and revelry echo
from within.  The establishment appears well maintained, despite the
slightly peeling paint on the doors.
28433.name: {XEntrance to the {%B{5ackstreet {%B{5illiards{X

description: You walk down the large corridor lobby of the Citizen's Center.
You see people walking around with there children, watching them point
out diffrent areas of interest.  In the center of the lobby you see a
small scale model of the completed Torregiano, or at least the plans
of the future.  To the north, you see a man dressed in a shopkeepers
outfit, asking people to walk in.  To the north you see a sailor
leering at people.  To the south you see a priest greeting people.
27658.name: The Lobby Of The Citizen's Center

description: A large locker room opens up, with almost endless rows of lockers
lined up.  In between each locker a large wooden bench splits the
space between each row of locker.  Several people stand in the locker
room, some half nude, changing into different clothing.  To the east
there is a door to {RThe Spa{x.  To the south is The Lobby, and east is
the Entrance to the pool.
27042.name: {MN{MT{GA {RG{rym {*& {&S{7pa{x [ {RLocker Rooms{x ]

description: Welcome to "The Lifeforce".  This is a vampire only nightclub (hence the
name NIGHTclub).  A large vampire looks at you as you walk in, checking for
some fangs or dark glasses.  The room is painted black, the only light
coming from a gas lamp.  You see a line of people dressed in black and
wearing sunglasses.  They seem to be getting in...  (vampires).  To the
west, loud music and lots of talk echos out from what looks like total
darkness.
27414.name: Entrance To The Lifeforce

description: The cobble stones split here were the Port Tunnel opens up into
Main Street.  The street splits in half, and in the center is a large
slanted ramp leading down into the Tunnel.  The tunnel runs under the
northern end of the city and out to the port, which is lower than the
main city.  To the west, a large warhouse stands, the sign of the
Anarchist Brewers on it.  To the east a small one story building
stands, a sign reads "{CTorregiano Travel{x".  Main Street continues north
and south
28924.name: {C>{c-{C>{RT{C<{c-{G[ {RM{rain {GS{gtreet {G]{c-{C>{BP{C<{c-{C<{x

description: You have a great view of Torregiano from here.  You are 15 stories above
the city now, and you can see all the buildings, the Reactors and even the
Sea Of Istar.  You stand on a large iron grid work, two large rails follow
the track, like rail road tracks.  In the far distance you can see "Stalin's
Organ" sitting, in all its mightness.  You also notice Legionaires walking
the tracks, armed......
27407.name: On Tower #54, Support Ring #1

description: A small dirt road known as East Access Road runs along here
going north and south.  The road runs along the outter fence of the
complex, for security measures.  These roads are used for the Port
Employees to move about and do their business.  The roads encircle the
entire complex to the Main Building, at the southern ends.  The roads
also connect into the main Airship Area.
27369.name: -[An Abandoned Home]-

description: You stand in FatTony's Office.  This room is very plain, but filled
with all kinds of papers and books.  A large desk stands towards the
back of the room, east.  Several maps of diffrent cities hang from the
walls, certain buildings coloured in.  The desk is covered in papers,
and boxes filled with papers line the walls.
27262.name: {GF{gat{GT{gony's {ROf{rfi{Rce{x

{x    {c|   {x{x{x  but no smoke comes from the factories, all the smoke stacks
{x    {c|   {x{x{x  are connected to a tunnel leading out of the city.
{x    {c|{x

description: A vampire constantly stands outside to the south leading into a
club known as The Lifeforce.  The club is exclusive to vampires only,
which sometimes causes problems to out of towners who do not know any
better.  Its also known if you slip the bouncers some cash, vampire or
not they will allow you to enter their club.  Its also known as the
party area of the city, always filled at night with the younger crowds
of people coming out, to hand in the clubs.  North of the street is
the Torregiano Battle Gardens, home to the battle arenas of the city.
To the south stands Kalilyn Park, the only major area of nature found
inside the city, besides people's front lawns in the neighborhoods.
27964.name: {G[{GH{gilp {GA{gvenue{G]{x

description: Nothing but air.  To the east is the Legionnaire Bridge, below,
The Harbor.
{x

description: A small dirt road known as NorthWest Access Road runs along here
going east and west.  The road runs along the outter fence of the
complex, for security measures.  These roads are used for the Port
Employees to move about and do their business.  The roads encircle the
entire complex to the Main Building, at the southern ends.  The roads
also connect into the main Airship Area.  Directly east is the
Northern Gate and North Access Road.
27377.name: {RNorth{x-{mWest {CH{cangar {RR{road{x
