description:
This guy looks like every other beggar you've ever seen.  His clothes are little more than dirty brown rags, and he looks like he hasn't taken a bath in weeks.
His eyes light up at the sight of you, and he scrapes and grovels before you, asking you for spare change.
27310.room_name: A scruffy beggar is here, begging to anyone who will listen.
27310.name: a scruffy beggar~
subroutines: F par ABCDEFGHIJK
27310.t_flags: T Can you spare some change, kind sir?~

27311.d_flags: D Says to you, "Bah.. you may have killed me.. but Ragnarok will... destroy you... soon enough......"~
description:
Looking at this wacko makes you want to laugh, but you wisely hold it back.  He is
wearing a dirty white priest's robe which is torn in several places, and his unwashed
hair is held back with a tarnished silver circlet. He looks up at you and says:
"The end is near!  Soon Ragnarok will come and destroy us all. Repent now,
before it is too late!  You are going to die! Die! Die! Diediediediediedie!
Muahahahaha! So am I! Buwahahahahahahahahahaha......!"
27311.room_name: The Mad Prophet of Doom is here, screaming "The end is near!"
27311.name: the Mad Prophet of Doom~
subroutines:
F for A
F par ABCDEFGHIJK
27311.t_flags: T You are all going to die!  Muahahaha!~

27312.d_flags: D Didn't get away with whatever he was doing, it seems..~
description:
A nondescript looking fellow at first, you soon realize from the way that he is
trying to sneak around, he is probably doing something illegal.  He wears a grey
cloak under which he seems to be concealing something.  A dagger perhaps?
27312.room_name: A shady-looking character is here, surely up to no good!
27312.name: a thief~
subroutines: F par ABCDEFGHIJK

27313.d_flags: D Mutters an oath at you as he falls to the ground...~
description:
You can almost smell the salt on this fellow.  A rather large man, he wears
a pair of baggy white breeches and a white sailor's tunic.  Both are clean,
but probably because he recently fell overboard.  His dark skin is probably
the result of long hours of working on a ship's deck.  He barely notices you
as he goes about his business.
27313.room_name: A sailor is here, taking time off from his ship to relax.
27313.name: a sailor~
subroutines: F par ABCDEFGHIJK

27314.room_name: Guido is here, quietly observing you.
27314.name: Guido~
subroutines: F par ABCDEFGHIJK

27315.d_flags: D Won't be beating up any more old ladies, it seems.~
description:
The arrogant look on this young punk's face tells you how high his opinion is of
himself. He wears a black leather jacket and leather pants, and his spiked hair is
held in place with a red bandana.  He waves his length of lead pipe threateningly,
but he doesn't seem eager to test his fighting skills against a trained adventurer.
In fact, he ignores you quite thorougly as he searches for some defenseless person
to beat up and loot.
27315.room_name: A tough-looking kid with spiked hair skulks around here, looking for someone to loot.
27315.name: a street punk~
subroutines: F par ABCDEFGHIJK
27315.t_flags: T Hey! You! Give me all your money or I'll bash your head in!~

27316.room_name: A member of the dreaded "Bloody Bastards" is here, glaring at your intrusion.
27316.name: a member of the Bloody Bastards~

description:

description:
This large statue is made of a shiny, silver-like metal. Could it POSSIBLY
be {7Mithril{^, the world's rarest metal?  Even ignoring the material of
this statue, however, it is a beautiful work of art.  It has the intricately
detailed form of a gigantic knight in shining, rune-encrusted armor.  The
great-axe which the knight is holding is a work of art of and unto itself. 
This great creation is sculpted of what looks to be ice magically sustained
at room temperature.  After looking at the glassy surface of the ice for a
time, strange, almost hypnotic, patterns seem to swirl beneath.

city government of Torregiano, just simply say the name of the
location you wish to go to.  Locations are pointed out in the city
